#include <queue>

int main()
{


		int t;
		cin>>t;
		while(t--)
		{

			string str;
			ss(str);
			int initcount=0;
			

			int len=str.length();
			rep(i,len)
			if(str[i]=='1')
				initcount++;
			int maxcount=-1;
			int i=0;
			while(str[i]!='0' && i<len)
					i++;
				int count=0;
				for(;i<len;)
				{
					
					if(str[i]=='0')
						count++;
					else 
						count--;
					if(count>maxcount)
						maxcount=count;
					i++;

					{
						count=0;
						while(str[i]!='0' && i<len)
							i++;

					}

					




				}



				pi(initcount+maxcount);

			}

}
